# Delphi Terminal

> Delphi Terminal is the aggregated prediction market data terminal by Delphi Markets, Inc.

Delphi Terminal provides institutional-grade Level 1, Level 2, and Level 3 market data across 7+ prediction market exchanges including Kalshi, Polymarket, PredictIt, Limitless, Opinion Labs, Metaculus, and Manifold.

## What Delphi Does

- Aggregates real-time and historical prediction market data from multiple exchanges into a single platform
- Provides L1 (top-of-book), L2 (full order book depth), and L3 (order-by-order) data feeds
- Proprietary market matching engine links equivalent markets across different exchanges for cross-exchange comparison
- Offers both a web-based terminal interface and a comprehensive REST + WebSocket API

## Who It's For

Traders, quantitative researchers, market makers, hedge funds, academic researchers, and anyone building on prediction market data.
